    • Method Detail

      • getInstruction

        public char getInstruction()
        Returns a char representing the current instruction. The current instruction is the one referenced by the Program counter. Returns a 'C' for a cpu instruction Returns a 'I' for an I/O cycle
        Returns:
        a character repesenting the type of instruction

      • timeToReady

        public int timeToReady()
        The amount of time this process has left on the blocked queue.
        Returns:
        0 if not blocked, otherwise number of cycles left blocked.

        public java.lang.String getName()

        public int getStartCycle()
        The delay before this job starts. This is the delay before it gets put onto the ready queue.
        Returns:
        the startCycle
